blend

public int blend(int c1,
                 int c2,
                 float p,
                 int bc)
Return a color blended between two source colors with a midpoint

Parameters:
c1 - color 1
c2 - color 2
p - distance away from the first color
bc - base color is handy for getting the alpha blending working on a solid color background
Returns:
result
